text:
Days lost; work-related; fatalities
Background
ESRS S1 paragraph 86 condenses the idea that: ‘The undertaking shall disclose information on …
the number of incidents associated with work-related injuries, ill health and fatalities of its own
workforce.’
ESRS S1 paragraph 88 states: ‘The disclosure required by paragraph 86 shall include the following
information, where applicable broken down between employees and non-employees in the
undertaking’s own workforce: …
